page.title: 08INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: {Kevin McKee Kevin is a professional footballer and plays for Hibernian football club of Edinburgh.His position is right back.He lives in Harburn Drive West Calder {Billy Hartley He is a young actor who lives in Langside Polbeth.Billy began by advertising Tennants lager and McEwans export on television.Now he stars in a programme called "Heart Heart." {George Fleming} He is also an actor but not as well known as Billy.Most of his work is in the theatre on stage but sometimes does work for independent television.He lives at 2 Gloag Place West Calder. {James "Paraffin" Young see later page number 13
